Tooltip: Load a configuration file into a dictionary to be used with the ConfigFactory static class to create Config classes. Ie. DispatcherConfig = ConfigFactory.FromDictionary<DispatcherConfig>(DictionaryConfig).

Arguments.Name: in_str_Path
Arguments.Tooltip: The file path to the config file.

Arguments.Name: in_list_ConfigNames
Arguments.Tooltip: The list of config names to load.

Arguments.Name: Output
Arguments.Tooltip: A dictionary to be used with the ConfigFactory static class to create Config classes. Ie. DispatcherConfig = ConfigFactory.FromDictionary<DispatcherConfig>(DictionaryConfig).
